full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @031B BCOM LDAN 'DAS 'JAM DPAL YE SHES SEMS DPA'I DON DAM PA'I MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA SH'AKYA THUB PAS GSUNGS PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SHRI DDHA KA RA WARMA DANG, KA MA LA GUPTA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA RIN CHEN BZANG POS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PO,, ,,@032A *, ,('DI BRIS DGE BAS BDAG SOGS RKANG DRUG TSOGS, ,'JAM DBYANGS NYIN BYED THUGS RJE'I 'OD STONG GIS, ,BLO YI PADMO'I GE SAR RGYAS MDZAD DE, ,RGYA CHE GSAL ZHING MYUR DANG ZAB PA DANG, ,THOS BSAM BSGOM DANG 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM SOGS KYI, ,SHES RAB SBRANG RTZI'I DGA' STON GYIS ROL PAS, ,PHYI NANG GRUB MTHA'I MTHAR SON SGRIB GNYIS KYI, ,MUN 'JOMS KUN MKHYEN YE SHES THOB GYUR CIG , ,,BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
translator_(орчуулагч): SHRI DDHA KA RA WARMA, KA MA LA GUPTA, RIN CHEN BZANG PO,
